description: Manage quota request status with quota.

commands.name: az quota request status list
commands.summary: For the specified scope, get the current quota requests for a one year period ending at the time is made. Use the **oData** filter to select quota requests.

commands.name: az quota request status show
commands.summary: Get the quota request details and status by quota request ID for the resources of the resource provider at a specific location. The quota request ID **id** is returned in the response of the PUT operation.
